document.full_text: bank of america corp  plans to spin off its last large private equity fund, with more than $5 billion in assets, and has no plans to make new private equity investments, a company spokesman said on tuesday.
document.title: bofa to spin off $5 billion private equity unit
lines_and_colors: bank of america corp  plans to spin off its last large private equity fund, with more than $5 billion in assets, and has no plans to make new private equity investments, a company spokesman said on tuesday.
